Catering - Royal Palm Village Wine & Tapas - Atlantic Beach Skip to content Skip to footer Home Restaurant Retail Events Catering About Tour Contact Catering Close Home Restaurant Retail Events Catering About Tour Contact Reservations kori@royalpalmwines.com 904-372-0052 Visit Us 296 Royal Palms Drive
Atlantic Beach, Florida 32233 True Ingredients. True Flavor. True Passion. A Culinary Oasis Royal Palm is a bar and restaurant in Atlantic Beach, Florida, known for its spin on traditional tapas. The bar features an extensive selection of domestic and international fine wines and craft beers. Royal Palm’s scratch kitchen uses local ingredients to introduce you to flavors from around the globe in dishes created for sharing. Offering over 1200 bottles of fine wine, 12 rotating drafts, and over 200 bottles of craft beer, guests can purchase their paired beverages by the glass, or a bottle from the selection. It's in the details Effortless Entertaining With detailed planning, unparalleled personal service, exquisite dining, and precise implementation, Royal Palms sets the standard for a memorable occasion. From chef curated menus to extravagant event design, Royal Palm offers full catering services to any social gathering. Known for providing the optimal space to host your shower or corporate gathering, they offer a seamless process that ensures consistent quality and timeliness. Special Requests Royal Palm will collaborate with you to accommodate reasonable requests in order to provide an extraordinary event for everyone. Hosting Events Able to serve outside parties up to any size, Royal Palm is limited to hosting parties of up 25 people within the restaurant's event rooms. Contact Us Creative Catering Cuisine Wine & Dine Royal Palm offers an exclusive experience to its guests by providing menu personalization, event timeline planning, and access to their extensive inventory of over 1500 craft beers and fine wines. Whether you are looking for an energizing, productive lunch break or a rewarding, celebration gala, Royal Palm is dedicated to creating an unforgettable culinary experience for your party. Please call with advanced notice to speak with our chef. *Consuming raw or under cooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of food borne illness. There is a risk associated with consuming raw oysters. If you have chronic illness of the liver, stomach or blood or have immune disorders, you are at greater risk of serious illness from raw oysters, and should eat oysters fully cooked. If unsure of your risk, consult a physician. About - Royal Palm Village Wine & Tapas - Atlantic Beach, FL Skip to content Skip to footer Home Restaurant Retail Events Catering About Tour Contact About Close Home Restaurant Retail Events Catering About Tour Contact Reservations kori@royalpalmwines.com 904-372-0052 Visit Us 296 Royal Palms Drive
Atlantic Beach, Florida 32233 Tradition with a Twist International Influence Royal Palm Village Wine & Tapas was established in 2011. Kori Blacker Tafoya always aspired to be a restaurateur, with years of experience in wine sales, restaurant management and service. David Joudi of Riverside Liquors was looking to open a second retail store at the beaches. They focused on providing unmatched customer service and expertise in the wine industry while seeking to create a community that brings people together. Inspired by European travel they sought to create an atmosphere which provides a transcendent experience. This would not be possible without a talented chef to make their dreams a reality. In 2011 Chef Chris Robert joined their team. Contact Us Seasonally inspired, locally sourced Chef Chris Roberts Chris is a classically trained chef with several years’ experience in the culinary arts. During his studies, he focused on the nuances of both French and classic American cuisine. He is a firm believer of sourcing locally and working closely with other small farmers who share in his passion to deliver only the best quality ingredients to their customers. This ensures fresh and flavorful dishes coming from the kitchen to the table. Raised in New Mexico, Chris immerses himself in preparing very flavorful southwestern and southern cuisine. He is also an avid baker.  His creativity and menu diversity have grown and continues to grow with Royal Palm’s concept. A Kitchen with Intention Our Values Family Royal Palm is creating  a community that brings friends and family together to share inspired dishes from around the world. Quality Not only does Royal Palm hand select  wines from all over the globe, they also use Floridian grown food for a local twist in flavor. Authenticity Featuring a scratch kitchen and hand selected wine collection, Royal Palm provides an authentic culinary experience. Proud of our Jacksonville roots Invested In Our Community Kori and David are focused on creating a business that gives back to the community. Invested in local agriculture, their number one priority is to support local farmers. Economic and agricultural growth is a small part of why they choose to work with small Floridian businesses. In addition, Royal Palm regularly hosts and donates to charities and organizations; including, the Child Cancer Fund, MS Society, Chemo Noir, and The Donna Foundation. What Our Guests Say... Try the Medjool dates wrapped in prosciutto and cheese, they offer a unique taste experience that guests love. Sample the Angus beef sliders with bacon and pepper jelly – they are a highlight on the menu that many find delightful. Ask for Christopher's recommendations on wine if you're unsure – he is known for his expertise in selecting the perfect bottle. Consider the in-house made hot sauce as a complement to your food; it's a favorite among regulars. Click here to send a gift up to $1,000 with the suggestion to use it at Royal Palm Village Wine & Tapas. Is this your business? Claim your business to update business information, customize this listing, and more! Learn more about Royal Palm Village Wine & Tapas Price $$ Ambience Casual, Classy Hours Monday-Tuesday: 11AM-9PM Wednesday-Saturday: 11AM-10PM Royal Palm Village Wine & Tapas is located in Atlantic Beach, Florida, bringing together a delightful assortment of tapas dishes and wines in a cozy setting. This charming eatery stands out for its welcoming atmosphere and engaging staff, perfect for both casual get-togethers and special occasions. Ambiance : The restaurant features a casual yet classy atmosphere, making it suitable for various occasions. Cuisine : Royal Palm Village specializes in tapas-style dishes, offering a mix of Mediterranean and modern flavors for a delightful dining experience. Highlights : Guests can select from a diverse wine collection, and enjoy unique small plates that are perfect for sharing. The unique concept of allowing guests to purchase wine at retail prices and enjoy it in-house with a minimal corkage fee adds to the appeal of Royal Palm Village. With attentive service and a creative menu, it has become a local favorite. The combination of delectable food and a fantastic wine selection makes this eatery a must-visit in the area. Customer Reviews Brenda .. 01/19/2025 Food was okay, but not the service. We had the croquettes, the bone marrow, the octopus and the jerk chicken. This last one was over cooked and dry. The... read review Rose H. 01/03/2025 My #1 place to go for dinner in Jacksonville. You have to get the oysters, the octopus, and the tuna! So good!  

All of the food is tapas style small... read review Mariah G. 11/05/2024 Down and Dirty: wonderful and relaxing atmosphere with delish food and friendly service.

Events - Royal Palm Village Wine & Tapas - Atlantic Beach Skip to content Skip to footer Home Restaurant Retail Events Catering About Tour Contact Events Close Home Restaurant Retail Events Catering About Tour Contact Reservations kori@royalpalmwines.com 904-372-0052 Visit Us 296 Royal Palms Drive
Atlantic Beach, Florida 32233 Turning Moments to Memories Private Events Royal Palm offers a unique experience by providing customized private events on or off site. If looking to host an event at Royal Palm we have daytime availability for private groups when planned in advanced. During the evening hours we have a semi-private area with a capacity maximum of 25 people. To reserve this space on Friday or Saturday evening, there is a minimum spend of $1000 plus tax and gratuity required. Contact Us Wine & Craft Beer Tastings With over 1200 options, professional sommeliers are available to create a tasting based on your unique palette. Pairing Events Once the wine is selected, chefs are able to curate a custom menu of hors d'oeuvres to compliment the tasting. Private Parties From bachelorette parties to company luncheons, the private dining spaces can be customized to fit any gathering. 14th Anniversary Wine Tasting Festival ATLANTIC BEACH 11/08/2025 14:00 Join us for Royal Palm’s 14th anniversary Wine Tasting Festival, benefiting the child Cancer Fund.  Celebrate with samplings of over 200 wines, keepsake wine glass, music, draft beer from local… Read more Contact Us Call to order for pick-up, schedule your next private dinner, plan catering for your event or call ahead for a large party. The dBA numbers displayed on the app and the website are averages of all the historical SoundChecks measured and submitted to the database. These SoundCheck dBA numbers are historical and thus are a reasonable guess as to what the specific venue’s sound level are and will be in the future. There is no guarantee that the average dBA displayed is or will be the actual noise level in the future. It is SoundPrint's goal to work with and not against louder venues. Retail - Royal Palm Village Wine & Tapas - Atlantic Beach Skip to content Skip to footer Home Restaurant Retail Events Catering About Tour Contact Retail Close Home Restaurant Retail Events Catering About Tour Contact Reservations kori@royalpalmwines.com 904-372-0052 Visit Us 296 Royal Palms Drive
Atlantic Beach, Florida 32233 Hand Selected Collection Meet Your Match With numerous accolades from local publications as having the best wine and beer selections in Jacksonville, we pride ourselves with the ability to pair you with the perfect wines to match your palate. Our friendly staff is knowledgeable having tasted most of the wines in the selection and can assist you in picking out the perfect bottle or case of wine. If we do not have a wine or beer that are looking for in stock, we are happy to special order it for you so long as it is distributed locally. Hand Selected Collection Meet Your Match With numerous accolades from local publications as having the best wine and beer selections in Jacksonville, we pride ourselves with the ability to pair you with the perfect wines to match your palate. Our friendly staff is knowledgeable having tasted most of the wines in the selection and can assist you in picking out the perfect bottle or case of wine. If we do not have a wine or beer that are looking for in stock, we are happy to special order it for you so long as it is distributed locally. Royal Palm Village Wine & Tapas - Atlantic Beach, FL Skip to content Skip to footer Home Restaurant Retail Events Catering About Tour Contact Close Home Restaurant Retail Events Catering About Tour Contact Reservations kori@royalpalmwines.com 904-372-0052 Visit Us 296 Royal Palms Drive
Atlantic Beach, Florida 32233 A Unique Bar & Tapas Experience ABOUT US Tour of Italy Wine Dinner Tickets... Purchase Here! Where Food, Wine & Ambiance Collide Authentic & Inspired Royal Palm is a traditional tapas bar with a modern twist. The restaurant features international wines, craft beers, and large plates to share, created from local ingredients. Pull up a chair at our comfortable, year round patio, or indoors for an authentic culinary experience. Where Food, Wine & Ambiance Collide Authentic & Inspired Royal Palm is a traditional tapas bar with a modern twist. The restaurant features both domestic and international wines, craft beers, and creative plates to share that when combined make a full meal. Our menu focuses of sourcing local ingredients when available and in season. Pull up a chair at our comfortable, year-round patio, or indoors for an authentic culinary experience. Scratch Kitchen From farm-to-table, Royal Palm offers a unique culinary experience with a  scratch kitchen and a rotating menu. Wine & Craft Beer Royal Palm holds a collection of over 200 craft beers & 1200 bottles of wine all available at the table or for retail. Reservations Operating on a first come first serve policy we do not take reservations. Large parties are encouraged to call ahead and arrive early, but we cannot guarantee a reservation dependent on the day and time you wish to dine. Contact Us A Culinary Experience Worth Sharing Menu Tapas traditionally are a variety of small dishes, paired with wine, beer or sangria and shared communally with friends and family. The tradition originated in the Catalan region of Spain. Today’s evolution of tapas incorporates traditions and influences from many different cultures and countries. Royal Palm provides substantial dishes that are a representation of this diversity created with a blend of local & seasonal ingredients. View Menu SIP, SAVOR, REPEAT. Globally Inspired, Locally Sourced Don’t know your Spätlese from your Trockenbeerenauslese? Don’t worry! The highly trained staff at Royal Palm can help you every step of the way, and even offer specific pairings for each dish on the menu. With a wine and beer selection that boasts over 1,200 wines by the bottle, and over 200 bottles of craft beers, Royal Palm truly has something for every palate and budget. Combining undiscovered gems with domestic and international favorites, Royal Palm loves to compare and contrast old and new world wines in an alternating inventory. Made for sharing and pairing, each dish at Royal Palm has been created in unison with our philosophy of the relationship between food and wine; one should enhance the other; both equally and simply enjoyed. Our chef-driven kitchen creates globally inspired, shareable plates using ingredients from local producers, while also paying respect to the culinary traditions that inspired them. Royal Palm is focused on creating the perfect pairing for your wine or beer. Making a memorable dining experience with each visit. No matter the occasion, Royal Palm invites you to drink, eat, share, relax and enjoy! Contact Us What Our Guests Say... Atlantic Beach, Florida 32233 Royal Palm is a bar and restaurant in Atlantic Beach, Florida, known for its spin on traditional tapas. The bar features an extensive selection of domestic and international fine wines and craft beers. Royal Palm’s scratch kitchen uses local ingredients to introduce you to flavors from around the globe in dishes created for sharing. Offering over 1200 bottles of fine wine, 12 rotating drafts, and over 200 bottles of craft beer, guests can purchase their paired beverages by the glass, or a bottle from the selection. / Tomato ANGUS SIRLOIN SALTADO $18 Papas Fritas / Caramelized Onions & Peppers / Broiled Tomato / Red Wine Saltado Sauce *Consuming raw or under cooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of food borne illness. There is a risk associated with consuming raw oysters. If you have chronic illness of the liver, stomach or blood or have immune disorders, you are at greater risk of serious illness from raw oysters, and should eat oysters fully cooked. If unsure of your risk, consult a physician. Please inform your server of any food allergies. Parties of 8 or more are subject to a 20% gratuity. A cake cutting fee of $20 for desserts brought in house.* Any bottle of wine selected from our retail wall is subject to $10 corkage fee when enjoyed in house. For those who bring in a bottle from outside the restaurant there is a $20 corkage fee. We always feature a list of hand selected bottles that do not have a corkage fee and are just the retail price to enjoy at the table. Offering full catering services, Royal Palm can accommodate a corporate, family, or social gathering of any size. Based on each individual event’s preferences and budget, the coordinator will then propose a personalized menu for your guests. In addition to food, Royal Palm also includes their vast selection of over 1200 types of fine wine and craft beers as a part of the catering menu at retail pricing. Email to request a proposal for a large party, private dinner or upcoming catering event.
